title: why am i getting SOOOOOO much LAGGGG????
body: over the past 3 days i have been experiencing MAJOR lag with LoL. nothing else is lagging, my internet is fine, youtube works fine as well so can someone tell me it isnt just me or how 2 fix it. i am so sick of getting into a game and not being able 2 do anything because i am lagging so damn much. my scores hav dropped dramatically and it really starting to annoy me. WHAT IS GOING ON?

replies.body: Okay, the permformance of your internet on Youtube is not a direct indicator of how well it will perform on League. They are two completely different things (one is streaming video while the other is updating your position/action). It *is* a possibility that your internet is just slow. What ISP are you with?

telstra
i have the best one so i hav no idea

That is an ISP with a good rep for League. That's not the problem.

Do you have any other applications open while playing League (eg. Internet Explorer, Safari, iTunes, Steam, Windows Media Player, Skype)? Also, what OS are you on?

nope none. just really bad. it now just says i have 2 re-update lol to 5.4 after i had already updated it last night. gets stuck on 1 file scanned and if i go to repair it it just comes up with bugsplat

There was a small hot-fix released today (to open up Nemesis Draft), so that's what that is.

If you're getting bug-splats on the patcher then you might have to reinstall the entirety of League. That may have been causing your lag in the first place, a certain corrupt file, but if that doesn't fix it, try the following:

[Refreshing your IP address.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq9) If that doesn't work, see what happens if you [change your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) (you'll need to flush your IP once again after doing this).

You didn't mention your OS, so I'm presuming you're on Windows.

You might also want to open up a support ticket if this doesn't fix it.

Best of luck!
